ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] No 49th song
ygData.msgSnippet: How about a group gate that takes the party to a random tavern in Norrath? ... From: Jennifer McComb [mailto:mccomb@voodoo.ca.boeing.com] Sent: Wednesday, May
ygData.messageBody:
How about a group gate that takes the party to a random tavern in Norrath?

-----Original Message-----
From: Jennifer McComb [mailto:mccomb@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 03, 2000 4:12 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] No 49th song


I saw the following on everlore's main page:

---

> Bard Song level 49 Still Missing!! there is still a problem with
> bard song for the 49th level. It's not in game. Please fix!

There isn't a 49th level song at this time, and it looks like there
might not be one. We've used the rest of the cool ideas that people
had on the 51+ songs, where bards get two per level. I'm certainly
willing to listen to suggestions though and talk them over with GZ. As
it is now, we could throw a song together just for the sake of putting
one in, but it wouldn't be cool.

-Gordon

---

They've used the rest of the cool ideas? Did they use any of the cool
ideas this group came up with in March? Just curious. Being a bard
of only 12 songs, I'm not really very familiar with any of the new
songs. Heck, I'm not extremely familiar with most of the old songs.

Adagia
Bard of 12 songs, Luclin


------------------------------------------------------------------------
